ans.potential_fix: Add a check to ensure the input stream is not empty before attempting to read from it. If it is empty, throw an appropriate exception or handle it gracefully.
Ensure that the input stream is not null or empty before proceeding with parsing. If it is, throw an exception or handle it accordingly.
Handle the case where the stream is empty more gracefully, possibly by returning a specific value or throwing an exception.
Ensure that the method can handle cases where no tokens are available, possibly by checking the input stream before processing.
Validate the input string before appending to the StringBuilder to avoid unexpected behavior.
